Erika
Did:

  • overlord - update react-maps; test deploy of #1803
  • tech-connect - prepare for demo
  • react-maps - research why in geocohort map, the map recenters on the previous view at postal code level when adding elevation after moving around the map #84
  • react-maps/poi-map - fix tooltip warnings #84
  • react-maps/geocohort-map- fix z-fighting when we have extruded polygons overlapping with 0 elevation factor - researched Deck.GL/WebGL polygonOffset but no solution yet, created issue #83
  • overlord - ask team and set opacity for 3D - decided on 0.6 #1803
  • react-maps - make new release v0.6.4
  • overlord - create alternative solution to Locus POI by placing the tabs vertically as they are currently in Report #1803
  • Widgets + Dashboard Brainstorming Session - add map widget discussion ideas
  • overlord - remove Atom POI #1803
  • overlord - remove lint warnings by adding // eslint-disable-next-line react/display-name #1803


Doing:

  • react-maps/locus map - add custom cursor prop, setup pickable for each layer #82
  • react-maps/locus-map - make a list and decide with the team which features should be added to locus-map as minimum requirements to replace Kepler map
  • poi-manage - change typography elements in POICard so we don't have clashes with styles set in overlord or snoke and update in overlord branch #1803

Doing:

  • locussdk - groom through and work on open-sourcing, with pypi distribtion
  • smaug/devops - automate deployment
